description:
Immerse yourself in the thrilling world of our survival project – a fierce battle for 2 vital points and your very survival! You will have only one mission: collect 2 points scattered randomly across the battleground while dodging, crashing, and outwitting rival vehicles.
     Key Features:
• Intense Arena Action: Dive into a thrilling arena where your goal is to secure 2 randomly placed points, all while navigating a battleground filled with 7 competing machines hell-bent on stopping you.
• Damage Gauge: Your vehicle comes equipped with a damage gauge – let it reach zero, and your game is over. Survive the onslaught, strategically plan your moves, and emerge as the ultimate survivor.
• Wreck and Defend: Not only can you collect points, but you can also take the offensive and crash into other players' vehicles, slowing down their progress and increasing your chances of victory.
• Health Bars: Monitor both your own and your rivals' health bars. Once a vehicle's health is depleted, it grinds to a halt, engulfed in flames. 
       Step into the arena, drive to survive, and emerge as the champion in this high-octane battle of machines. Are you ready to emerge victorious, or will your damage gauge hit zero? Are you up for the challenge?
name: Heavy Car Battle - Demolition Derby
intro: Race, Wreck, Win – The Ultimate Car Carnage Challenge!
